clue.en: To depart; to go to another place.
Gone; gone by; gone away; passed; passed away.
clue.zh: 走了；过去了；消失了；通过了；去世了。

clue.en: Near the end of a period of time.
The whole duration of a being, whether animal, plant, or other kind, being alive.
clue.zh: 一个生物（无论是动物、植物还是其他物种）活着的整个持续时间。

clue.en: To bowl a __er at a batsman, especially to get a batsman out in this way.
clue.zh: 将约克人投向击球手，尤其是用这种方式将击球手赶出局。

clue.en: A substance (of molecular formula H₂O) found at room temperature and pressure as a clear liquid; it is present naturally as rain, and found in rivers, lakes and seas; its solid form is ice and its gaseous form is steam.
clue.zh: 在室温和压力下为透明液体的物质（分子式为 H2O）；它以雨的形式自然存在，存在于河流、湖泊和海洋中；它的固态形式是冰，气态形式是蒸汽。

clue.en: The whole duration of a being, whether animal, plant, or other kind, being alive.
clue.zh: 一个生物（无论是动物、植物还是其他物种）活着的整个持续时间。

clue.en: To bowl a __er at a batsman, especially to get a batsman out in this way.
clue.zh: 将约克人投向击球手，尤其是用这种方式将击球手赶出局。

clue.en: Activity for amusement only, especially among the young.
clue.zh: 仅供娱乐的活动，尤其是年轻人。

clue.en: Gone; gone by; gone away; passed; passed away.
clue.zh: 走了；过去了；消失了；通过了；去世了。
